title: Gloria Dei Church National Historic Site: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility       The Gloria Dei Church National Historic Site is partially accessible for those with mobility challenges.    The historic church is accessible through a permanent ramp on the entrance door.   The cemetery is not accessible.   There are no accessible restrooms on site.  For additional information about accessibility at the site, please contact the church at 215-389-1513.
